name: .H5U File Extension
summary: Learn about .H5U files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use an H5U file with Heroes of Might and Magic V, place the file in the game's UserMODs directory. The next time you launch Heroes of Might and Magic V, the game will automatically load and apply the mod(s) your H5U file contains.

If you want to view or edit an H5U file's contents, rename the file to use the .ZIP extension and decompress it as you would any ZIP archive. If you want to repackage your decompressed H5U file's contents, zip them up and rename the resulting ZIP file to use the .h5u extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
